API_Description: Represents the date and time when the document was last modified.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'ModDate' suggests it is related to the modification date of the document, which is a common property in document metadata.
Returns: The modification date of the document as a string.
Returns_Reason: Modification dates are typically represented as strings in a standard date-time format.

type.description: The format in which the modification date is returned.
type.description_reason: The parameter 'type' likely specifies the format of the date string, which is common for date-related properties.
type.type_reason: Formats are usually specified as strings, indicating the desired output format.
